body: I'm not sure if there is a post about this but if there is please lemme know, I was just wondering if /ignore is gonna be added or if there is any way to ignore someone! Thanks :3
body_tagged: I'm not sure if there is a post about this but if there is please lemme know, I was just wondering if /ignore is gonna be added or if there is any way to ignore someone! Thanks :3
title: /ignore ??

replies.body:
I rather not see this.

If someone is harrasing you and such you should deal with it by reporting the player not running away and hiding. The player will continue on other accounts or go after other players if a person ignores them. If the player is banned he won't be able to continue doing the same thing.

Don't run away from the problem. DEAL with the problem (by reporting).
replies.body_tagged:
I rather not see this.

If someone is harrasing you and such you should deal with it by reporting the player not running away and hiding. The player will continue on other accounts or go after other players if a person ignores them. If the player is banned he won't be able to continue doing the same thing.

Don't run away from the problem. DEAL with the problem (by reporting).

replies.body:
Option 1: Turn down your opacity.
Option 2: File an online report and leave the game.
Option 3: Use /report and leave the game.
replies.body_tagged:
Option 1: Turn down your opacity.
Option 2: File an online report and leave the game.
Option 3: Use /report and leave the game.

replies.body:
what if im havin a nice chit chat with my homeslices and this randy comes along and hurts mi wittle itty bitty feelings. i cant just block out the chat

theres not enough evidence for a tb. so, the player isnt being punished

its a piss poor time for the staff. theyre very busy and theres not many on due to the time.

now what?

replies.body:
i want to be able to report them and ignore them.
people can be potentially scarred for life by things that others say to them online. people have said some things to me on avicus i wish i could forget, that actually fucked me up for a while. i could've used the ignore then.

sometimes it's 100% necessary to "run away".

replies.body:
*** scarred for life by things that others say to them online ***

Then I don't think they should be on the internet. If someone really says something you dont want to see, turn chat off or switch servers.

replies.body:
okay, seriously? people have events in their life that are absolutely horrifying and when you say something that brings it up again, it can set off a trigger and really fuck you up for a bit. saying 'scarred for life' may have been a bit much, but it has happened before. i'm just saying that some people need to watch what they say instead of telling the victims to get off the internet. it's pretty simple, just don't be an asshat to people. i'm not gonna switch servers, avicus is unique and has a community i've gotten to know.
if you haven't been in this experience, you shouldn't be talking. you haven't seen or felt what people can do online if they find what hurts you most.

replies.body:
*** i'm not gonna switch servers, avicus is unique and has a community  ***

I ment switch servers on avicus. Go off nebula01 and go on 02. If they follow you to say crap to you it could count as harrasment.

*** if you haven't been in this experience, you shouldn't be talking ***

I have been. Guess what I did. I ignored the issue by simply switching servers.

You can't stop trolls. There will always be someone out there. What you can do is avoid them. In minecraft this is simple. Just go on a different server.

If you can't take the heat stay out of the fire. Some people don't belong on the internet and if someone is a b**ch to you, just go off and come back later. He probably won't be online or wouldn't notice you being online.

replies.body:
As long as you report instantly and descriptively... the report most probably will be answered... we have a ton of staff ^-^
Just keep in mind:
It'll be better to:
./report ragingp1 Harassing players.
than
./report ragingp1 swear
or
./report ragingp1 mean

replies.body:
There was already a Suggestion like that...
I only remember that it can get very annoying if some players ignore 1 person like bullying... so -1
(PS: Wrong account, I know....)
(PSS: You never will know who I am! >:D)
(PSSS: If someone tells them who I am, I ignore you, even without the command)
